data.text: Davide ná-guyei, siɛgi zu é ɓɔɠɔ ɠɛɛni la ga titi nui Aɓimelɛke ɠaazu, naa kpɛ, é ʋela, é li.
Ungo, yeenɔpɛ nà yɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mamasu ɠɔ,
Nà-ɓɔɠɔ maamusɛi ma ungi ɠa é ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI.
À ʋa wo ɓɔ bà, ade Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ ʋɔɔma!
Gè Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaiziɛni, é gòoɠaaʋote,
Siɛgi zu nu wɛlɛzu la tɔun ba, ɗa ɗa volo ga koozunɛɛi,
Maanɔɠɔ nui kpeei looni, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI goomɛnini,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai ɠa naati maaɠoolii zu,
À kɔɠɔ, wo pɛtɛ, ʋelegi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋagai la!
À lua Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa, wɔi wo ga ná-nu ɲadegaiti!
Zala yiʋoiti ta ɗa ʋala ani ma, ti yɛ pului zu,
À ʋa, dòun zunuiti, wo woilo gòoi ma!
Zunui ɓɛ ɠa é wɔinni ga zɛnvui,
È-nɛgi makɛ, é mina faa ɲɔu ɠɛ,
Ʋoluave faa ɲɔi ʋa, è faa ʋagɔi ɠɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuʋɛ ɠa telebo nuiti ba,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa ɠaazuʋɛ lati naati daalɔɠɔma, niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu,
Siɛgi zu telebo nuiti ti kpeei loozu la, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa woilo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ziiɠoloɠolo nuiti koba,
Maanɔɠɔ mɔinmɔin ka ɗa zeeli telebo nui ma,
Toɠa ma ɠaeiti pɛ makɛ,
Maanɔɠɔi ɠa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ʋaa,
kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa ná-botiɠɛ nuiti kpein zɛnvui ɠizo,
